actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that tobacco graders shall be retained in a pay status for 10 months in a calendar year, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that tobacco graders employed by the Department of Agriculture shall be retained in a pay status for ten months in a calendar year. States that such employees may be assigned to other duties when they are not grading tobacco.

titles.title: A bill to provide that tobacco graders shall be retained in a pay status for 10 months in a calendar year, and for other purposes.
